definition: to concern/on (some topic)/about/concerning/to have importance for
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: I know him quite well, and there are wheels within wheels.
sentences.chinese: 我很瞭解他，那裏的人事關係很複雜。

sentences.english: That car matters a great deal to him.
sentences.chinese: 那輛車對他來說事關重大。

sentences.english: Flag issue is radical, and route issue is relating to overall phase.
sentences.chinese: 旗幟問題至關重要，道路問題事關全局。

sentences.english: When you're a financial institution you can't fool around.It's all about confidence.
sentences.chinese: 一家金融機構不能糊弄人，這是事關信心的問題。

sentences.english: Commissariat safety is the major problem that the issue involves country and area society stability.
sentences.chinese: 糧食安全是事關國家和地區社會穩定的重大問題。

sentences.english: The bureau chief thinks to matter to importance and immediately turn up.
sentences.chinese: 所長認爲事關重要，立即轉上。

sentences.english: When you're a financial institution you can't fool around. It's all about confidence.
sentences.chinese: 一家金融機構不能糊弄人，這是事關信心的問題。

sentences.english: As this is a matter which concerns the whole school, the entire student body will be present.
sentences.chinese: 由於事關整所學校，所以所有學生都要出席。

sentences.english: House prices concern millions of households.
Accelerating the economic development of counties is important to the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 加快縣域經濟發展，事關國民經濟的發展大局。

sentences.english: The quality of statistical data influences the science of Macroeconomic policy-making.
sentences.chinese: 統計數據質量事關宏觀社會經濟政策制定的科學性。

sentences.english: The Spain defeat now means that this afternoon is sudden death.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的翻盤意味著這個下午事關生死。

sentences.english: The Lohar cared about their craft because they cared about their identity.
sentences.chinese: Lohar部落非常在意他們的手藝，因爲事關身份。

sentences.english: Cultiveating and improving the humane quality of university students is work concerning the overall situation.
sentences.chinese: 培養和提高大學生的人文素質是一項事關全局的工作。

sentences.english: I direct the region of a famous human-relations agency.
sentences.chinese: 我在一家著名的人事關係機構擔任部門主管。

sentences.english: How's your golf game? The answer may tell you a lot about your health.
sentences.chinese: 足下高爾夫球技如何？這可是一個事關你健康的問題。
